title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Ian O'Connor on Brady/Belichick Breakup, QB Evals with Marc Trestman, Bills/Chiefs SNF Pick
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Ian O'Connor on Brady/Belichick Breakup, QB Evals with Marc Trestman, Bills/Chiefs SNF Pick
description:
The best of this week's Colin Cowherd Podcast! First, Colin's top takes, including why Urban Meyer's repeated bad decision making is a real problem for the Jaguars (3:00). why Belichick's brand of football suddenly seems outdated (9:00), and why he didn't crush Baker Mayfield's dismal performance in a win over the Vikings (14:00).

First, NY Post columnist and Belichick author Ian O'Connor discusses what Belichick might've said to Brady in their postgame locker room meeting, and if the Brady/Belichick relationship was always destined to implode (17:00). Then, former Bears Head Coach and longtime NFL OC Marc Trestman points out some of the glaring red flags he sees with Jets rookie Zach Wilson, and why the gap between Justin Herbert and Patrick Mahomes isn't as big as most people think (28:00). And finally, Action Network CCO Chad Millman and Colin on the sharp play in the Chiefs/Bills SNF matchup (41:00).

Make sure you follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
